external_references.description: Symantec Threat Hunter Team. (2023, July 18). FIN8 Uses Revamped Sardonic Backdoor to Deliver Noberus Ransomware. Retrieved August 9, 2023.

description: [FIN8](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0061) has used PowerShell Scripts to check the architecture of a compromised machine before the selection of a 32-bit or 64-bit version of a malicious .NET loader.(Citation: Symantec FIN8 Jul 2023)
